analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xac58b329e7627e3685a75c475d79787576803c07.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_contracts/0xac58b329e7627e3685a75c475d79787576803c07.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_referredBy' of PennyEther.buy (/unique_contracts/0xac58b329e7627e3685a75c475d79787576803c07.sol#174-175) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amountOfTokens' of PennyEther.sell (/unique_contracts/0xac58b329e7627e3685a75c475d79787576803c07.sol#253-254) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_customerAddress' of PennyEther.dividendsOf (/unique_contracts/0xac58b329e7627e3685a75c475d79787576803c07.sol#459-460) is not in mixedCase
